quote: Although he never speaks of how or what or why, I know that his childhood was difficult, that his parents broke his heart. Books and excess poundage are his insulation against pain.
quote_letters: ALTHOUGH HE NEVER SPEAKS OF HOW OR WHAT OR WHY I KNOW THAT HIS CHILDHOOD WAS DIFFICULT THAT HIS PARENTS BROKE HIS HEART BOOKS AND EXCESS POUNDAGE ARE HIS INSULATION AGAINST PAIN
